name: Freedom Fantasy
short_description: Freedom Fantasy is a project to develop a free software implementation of the classic NES game Final Fantasy. It will feature an original story and will star leading free/open-source characters like Tux, the GNU, and Beastie instead of Square Enix's copyrighted characters. The game is available under the GNU GPL version 3 or later. The project is developed in GCC-compatible C99.
summary: Free software implementation of the classic NES game Final Fantasy.
